input: On a vehicle ,secure the ladder to a proper ladder rack ,or fasten it to a trailer on at least two points .
target: Tó bá jẹ́ ọkọ̀ lo fẹ́ lò ,gbé e kọ́ ìkọ́ àkàbà ,tàbí kóo so ó mọ́ ọkọ̀ akẹ́rù ,ó kéré tán ,lọ́nà méjì .

input: Position the ladder correctly .

input: For safety ,the ladder should not lean sideways and must rest at an angle of 75 degrees from the floor .
target: Kí ó má bàa séwu ,àkàbà ò gbọ́dọ̀ fì sẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ kan ,kò sì gbọ́dọ̀ dagun ju ìwọ̀n ìdagun márùndínlọ́gọ́rin lọ .

input: Provide support at the top and at the base .

input: Take particular care that when you initially climb the ladder ,you tie it at the top .

input: To make the first and last climbs safer ,have an assistant hold the ladder at its base while you climb .
target: Kí o má bàa já bọ́ ní ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ yẹn àtìgbà tóo bá ń sọ̀ kalẹ̀ ,jẹ́ kí ẹnì kan bá ẹ dì í mú nísàlẹ̀ nígbà tóo bá ń gùn ún ,tàbí tóo bá ń sọ̀ .

input: If the ground slopes away from the building ,place something heavy at the base of the ladder or tie a lower rung to a fixture .

input: If the ground is uneven but solid ,use a wedge to get a level base .
